parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for showing statistic (timestamp), default: today

serverTimestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the server time in seconds

onTimeEmployees.description: The number of employees who are on time

absentEmployees.description: The number of employees who are absent

lateArrivalEmployees.description: The number of employees who arrived late

earlyDepartureEmployees.description: The number of employees who left early

dayOffEmployees.description: The number of employees on their day off

get.summary: Get Attendance statistics for last 7 days

200.description: Successfully retreived attendance statistics for last 7 days

totalEmployeeAttendance.description: Total number of employee attendances on that day

get.summary: Get attendance statistic by department in last 7 days

200.description: Successfully retrieved attendance statistic by department in last 7 days

totalEmployeeAttendance.description: Total number of employee attendances on that day

200.description: Successfully retrieved employee statistic by department
